name: TallyArbiter
description: Tally Arbiter is a Node.js server that is capable of listening/fetching tally data from multiple sources (and source types) and ultimately arbitrating whether a end device is considered to be in Preview or Program. Supports TSL 3.1, Blackmagic ATEM, OBS Studio, and StudioCoast VMix (currently). Tally output can be viewed on the server, on a web page, or using a listener script, with blink(1) devices on Raspberry Pi zeroes over wireless.
author: Joseph Adams
